attributes.action: To give urgent priority to Yazidis seeking asylum in the UK
attributes.background: The Yazidi Community is facing persecution and possible extinction at the hands of the terrorist organisation known as Islamic state. Priority must be given to this community regarding any asylum applications here in the UK.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107689
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
